{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ROCK64 board-1.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = ROCK64 4K60P HDR Media Board Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.pine64.org/devices/single-board-computers/rock64/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = PINE_ROCK64_(1GB) |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Pine64 |model = ROCK64 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = (1GB) |revision = V2.0 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3328; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz <!-- 1.5 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q128CSIG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = SpecTek;PBO47-125; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0, eMMC module socket, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 3.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1.35 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, via GPIO header,, (1500000 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 2.0a, A/V out (3.5mm), Micro SD Card slot, I2C, I2S, SPI, GPIO |addchip = Power Management IC w/ RTC;Rockchip;RK805-1;;1;,,, Stereo Line Driver w/ Adjustable Gain;SG Micro;SGM89000;;1;,,, 5.5V 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;3;,,, 4-Line Uni-Directional Transient Voltage Suppressor;Will Semiconductor;ESD5304D;;2;,,, High-PSRR 500mA LDO;Powtech;PT5108;;2; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2017 |estprice = 25 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0868WSTXH |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B0755X3SBM |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Designed in Silicon Valley, California. Built in Silicon Delta, China." :is silkscreened on back of board. "ROCK64 V2.0" and "2017-0713" is silkscreened on board.
{{See also|Pine64|List of SBCs}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3328 @1.5GHz 64-bit :Quad-Core (ARM Cortex A53) Processor *GPU: Mali-450 MP2 (supporting 4K @60fps) :Video decoding via VP9 or 10-bit H265/H264 *Flash: 16MB (SPI), RAM: 1GB (LPDDR3) *Ports: 1x GbE (10/100/1000Mbps) LAN (RJ-45) :2x USB 2.0 Host, 1x USB 3.0 Host ports :microSD Card slot, eMMC module socket, :40-pins GPIO header, A/V out (3.5mm) jack *Physical Power / Reset / Recovery buttons *IR Receiver; Linux or Android available *Size: 85 x 56 x 18 mm, Weight: 40g
==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/ROCK64_Main_Page On '''Pine64''' Wiki] So far there are three different models: :• ROCK64 (1GB DRAM) :• ROCK64 (2GB DRAM) :• ROCK64 (4GB DRAM)
==See also== *[[PINE A64+ 2GB]] • [http://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/PINE_A64_Main_Page MPage] *[[PINE A64-LTS]] • [http://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/PINE_A64-LTS/SOPine_Main_Page MPage] *[[PINE H64 Model A]] • 1GB/2GB/3GB • [https://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/PINE_H64_Model-A_Main_Page MPage] *[[PINE H64 Model B (3GB)]] • 1GB/2GB/3GB • [http://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/PINE_H64_Main_Page MPage] *[[PINE ROCK64 (4GB)]] • [http://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/ROCK64 MPage] *[[PINE ROCKPro64]] •[https://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/ROCKPro64 MPage]
